PYA_HEADER: Protect Your Account with Two-Factor Authentication
PYA_SUBTITLE: Login verification helps keep your account more secure. Choose how you would like to receive the Verification Code below.
PYA_CHARGES: Standard data or messaging rates may apply.
PYA_BOTTOM_TEXT: Weâ€™ll save this for next time. You can change it in your preferences.
AUTH_ACCOUNT_LOCKED: After multiple failed attempts, you are locked out.
OTP_ACC_CODE: Protect Your Account with Two-Step Verification
OTP_ENTER_CODE: Enter the Verification code we sent you.
OTP_CODE_TIME: Please wait 25 second before time to resend. If sent by email please, check your spam folder.
OTP_VERIFICATION_EMAIL: Login verification helps keep your account more secure. Please check {verificationTo} for an email with your Verification Code and come back here to get properly verified. Your code may take a few moments to arrive.
OTP_VERIFICATION_PHONE: Login verification helps keep your account more secure. Please check {verificationTo} for a text message with your Verification Code and come back here to get properly verified. Your code may take a few moments to arrive.
OTP_CALL_TECH_SUPPORT: or call tech support at (888) 737-2255 US or (905) 812-3520 Canada.
OTP_SENT_TEXT: We've texted your Verification Code to you.
OTP_SENT_EMAIL: We've emailed your Verification Code to you. Please check your spam folder or request a new Code if you don't receive it.
POL_GENERIC_ERROR: Unable to register you online. Please call (888) 737-2255 US or (905) 812-3520 Canada for assistance with your account.
POL_SESSION_BANNER: You're session is going to expire in 5 minutes.
POL_SESSION_EXPIRED: Session has expired. Please try again.
POL_EMAIL_TAKEN: A ClientName Online account with this email address already exists
POL_RETRY: You may retry after 30 minutes or call Tech Support for assistance at (888) 737-2255 for US.
